channel.title: Opscode on Richard Sumilang
channel.description: Recent content in Opscode on Richard Sumilang

item.title: Chef Gearman Cookbook v0.1.0
item.description: A little Gearman cookbook I put together for Chef. Supports installing multiple versions by source. Also has a recipe for the PHP extension. Grab it from GitHub! kthxbye.

item.title: Update Chef Solo on your Vagrant
item.description: Install vagrant-omnibus: vagrant plugin install vagrant-omnibus Configure your Vagrantfile before provisioning to the latest version of Chef: config.omnibus.chef_version = :latest You can also upgrade to a specific version like so: config.omnibus.chef_version = "11.12.8"
